it's basically your compass for how you

this funky Giri building over there and

maybe we want to make me democratize

maybe we just want to buy it you know
maybe we want to solve the world's

maybe we want to do that and we

and we had to be clear we had no product

when you're starting your company for
their first time because starting
companies heart like I would actually
never recommend that somebody become a

the only reason to start a company is if

this then you decide that starting a

it's a horrible time to raise money I'm

he's an engineer and we had ideas about

we've made that platform sufficiently

when we started all right that this
turns out to be a pretty decent market

and we basically figured out that hey
there's an opportunity to replace those

there was actually a market there and so
on the back back of that we said for the

and it seems to me that this might be a

suggests to me that they're probably

and that's a competitive edge relative
